LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
This Plugin synchronizes your newsletter subscribers directly with your MailChimp lists.

  1. Enter your MailChimp API-Key. More Information about the API-Key can be found here:
    http://kb.mailchimp.com/article/where-can-i-find-my-api-key
  2. Choose the MailChimp list with which you want to synchronize the data from your shop
  3. Import all Newsletter-Subscribers for the first time. (Important: This procedure should only be executed once)
  4. Decide whether to synchronize automatically or manual
    a) automatically: Active the appropriate option
    b) manual: Click the button manual Synchronization whenever the synchronization should be executed
  5. Enter your WebHooks-Key to get informed about the unsubscribe event from MAilChimp. Further information about WebHooks can be found here
    http://apidocs.mailchimp.com/webhooks/
